parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>TRUE</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>TRUE. The post explicitly mentions Elena Lasconi, President of USR, and implicitly refers to other candidates by contrasting their political stances.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>TRUE. This is a paid Facebook post, designed to reach a wide audience, not a private communication.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>TRUE. The post's primary objective is to persuade voters to support Elena Lasconi and the USR party by highlighting the contrast between their vision for Romania's future and that of opposing candidates.  The language used ("Miza alegerilor," "viitorul democratic," "votăm pentru România") directly appeals to voters' choices in the upcoming elections.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>FALSE. While the post presents information, it does so in a highly partisan manner, advocating for a specific political viewpoint and candidate, rather than providing objective journalistic analysis.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>FALSE. The post is not a personal opinion; it's a carefully crafted political message aimed at influencing voters' choices.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>544653405387551</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by Teodor Lazăr, promotes Elena Lasconi and the USR party in the context of the upcoming parliamentary elections.  The post uses strong language to contrast USR's vision with that of opposing candidates, directly urging voters to choose USR. The presence of a CMF number (CMF 11240015) further confirms its nature as electoral propaganda. The post's objective is clearly to influence voters' choices, fulfilling the criteria of Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006.  The post's targeting, reach (8K-9K impressions, 100K-500K reach estimate), and spend (RON 200-RON 299) all indicate a deliberate attempt to sway public opinion.  While the post does not explicitly instruct voters at polling stations, its clear intent is to influence the outcome of the election.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate>
    <name>Elena Lasconi</name>
    <impact>POSITIVE</impact>
  </candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>USR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Teodor Lazăr, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID 544653405387551) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează candidata Elena Lasconi și Partidul USR pentru alegerile parlamentare, folosind un limbaj puternic și apeluri directe la vot. Postarea, cu un buget de 200-299 RON, a generat 8.000-9.000 de impresii și o estimare a acoperirii de 100.000-500.000 de persoane, având ca efect electoral influențarea votului în favoarea candidatei menționate. Prezența numărului CMF 11240015 confirmă caracterul de propagandă electorală.  Conținutul postării, care face referire la „miza alegerilor”, „viitorul democratic al României” și îndeamnă la vot pentru USR, constituie o încălcare clară a prevederilor legale.  Contact: teodor.lazar@gmail.com, +40740269432.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
